Detailed Description

Runs an evolutionary tournament between a set of players.

This class is responsible for running an "evolutionary" tournament between a set of players. A list of players is maintained (see the AddPlayer and RemovePlayer methods), and the tournament is run by computing the relative score of each player to determine the fraction of each in the next generation of the population.

The players' fractions at each generation are stored in the data member for later use or graphing.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

EvoTournament::EvoTournament ( Game *  gm)

Constructor.

Sets the game value.

Parameters:
gmInitial value of the game member.

Member Function Documentation

void EvoTournament::AddPlayer ( const Player *  player)

Add a player to the internal list.

This function is intended to be called in respone to the wxEVT_ADD_PLAYER event. The player passed will be cloned and placed on the players list.

This function will not store the pointer passed to it.

Parameters:
playerPlayer to be cloned and added to the tournament
bool EvoTournament::IsPlayed ( )

Has the tournament been played?

Returns:
True if the tournament has been played, false otherwise
void EvoTournament::RemovePlayer ( const Player *  player)

Remove this player from the internal list.

This function will search the internal list for a player of the same ID as the one passed, and remove it if found.

This function will not store the pointer passed to it.

Parameters:
playerPlayer of the same ID as that to be removed
void EvoTournament::Reset ( )

Reset all internal data.

This function clears the tournament data and resets the played value to false.

bool EvoTournament::Run ( int  numGenerations)

Run an evolutionary tournament.

Computes the population fractions, beginning at equal fractions and evolving proportional to player scores over time. The results are accumulated in the data member.

Parameters:
numGenerationsNumber of evolutionary generations to compute
Returns:
True if the tournament ran successfully, false otherwise

Member Data Documentation

GenerationWeightArray EvoTournament::data

The player fractions at every generation of the tournament.

This array has as many elements as generations in the tournament, and each element specifies the fractional weight of the players in the tournament at that generation.

Game to be played.
